definition: to catapult/to launch/to eject (from a plane)/to shoot
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Touch and move trigger of catapult and see changes of power.
sentences.chinese: 觸摸和移動觸發彈射器，看到力的轉變。

sentences.english: Get more balls into the tulips to increase your chances.
sentences.chinese: 彈射更多的球體到炮口裏面以增加你的遊戲機會。

sentences.english: They hit him, they gave him a bullet in his heart'.
sentences.chinese: 他們就打他，還把把子彈射進了他的心臟。

sentences.english: Surprisingly, the black hole also catapults stars away.
sentences.chinese: 出人意料的是，黑洞也會彈射恆星。

sentences.english: The ejection - port cover rolled shut and there was a feeling like being shot from a cannon .
sentences.chinese: 彈射口蓋板迴轉關閉，之後就有種炮彈出膛的感覺。

sentences.english: The security forces responded by firing live ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 安全部隊實彈射擊予以迴應。

sentences.english: The intensity of the live fire and bombing drills will now be stepped up, though.
sentences.chinese: 然而，現在要加強實彈射擊和轟炸訓練的強度。

sentences.english: A hook head for ejection is disposed below the front part of the airplane body.
sentences.chinese: 機身前部下方設置有彈射用的鉤頭。

sentences.english: The game has 12 levels and 3 types of projectiles for catapult.
sentences.chinese: 遊戲有12級和3個類型的射彈彈射器。

sentences.english: When the plane caught fire, the pilot ejected.
sentences.chinese: 飛機着火時，飛行員從機內彈射出來。

sentences.english: Since the beginning, thrill rides were designed to both exhilarate and terrify.
sentences.chinese: 從最開始，彈射座椅的設計就充滿了緊張刺激。

sentences.english: His third reach was all instinct.
sentences.chinese: 他的手第三次接觸彈射拉手，靠的完全是一種本能。

sentences.english: The cockpit cover is the air bubble shape, the pilot field of vision is good, internal installation 0 ejection seats.
sentences.chinese: 座艙蓋爲氣泡形，飛行員視野好，內裝零零彈射座椅。
三叉路口被公然用作“實彈射擊區”。

sentences.english: Many pilots waited too longbefore ejecting from planes that were about to crash.
sentences.chinese: 很多飛行員會等很久才從即將墜毀的飛機中彈射出來。

sentences.english: It has even landed and taken off from a carrier deck without benefit of arresting gear or catapults.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至能夠使用彈射器和沒有制動裝置的甲板上起降。

definition: to form a picture/to develop a photo/to visualize
the front (nose) of a plane etc
